properties.areaDesc: Graves, KY; Fulton, KY; Hickman, KY; Calloway, KY
properties.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 3 at 2:04AM CST until March 3 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a

* Flash Flood Warning for...
Southeastern Fulton County in western Kentucky...
Calloway County in western Kentucky...
Eastern Hickman County in western Kentucky...
Southern Graves County in western Kentucky...

* Until 800 AM CST.

* At 202 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing
heavy rain across the warned area. Up to one inch of rain has
already fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin
shortly with another quick one to two inches of rain expected.

HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas,
highways, streets and underpasses as well as other
drainage and low lying areas.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Murray...                         Mayfield...
Fulton...                         Wingo...
Hazel...                          Water Valley...
Lynnville...                      Fulgham...
Sedalia...                        New Concord...
Fancy Farm...                     Kirksey...
Dukedom...                        Harris Grove...
Crossland...
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.
